colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @027A *, ,(CES DPAL LHA MO DMAR ZOR MA'I SGO NAS RNO MTHONG SGRUB TSUL 'DI YI 'BRAS BSHAD DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI GAM DU BCAR BA'I CHOS 'KHOR MKHAN TSAB GZHUNG LUGS RGYA MTSO @027B RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA NGAG DBANG DNGOS GRUB NAS, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I SHO MO SHIN TU BSDUS PAS DPYAD DKA' BA DANG, ,BLA MA GONG MAS MDZAD PA 'GA' ZHIG KHA 'THOR ZHING, ,THENG GSUM BOR DGOS PAS NGOS 'DZIN DKA' BAR 'DUG PAS THENG GCIG BOR BAS CHOG PA'I GSAL BA DGOS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL MA BYUNG BAR BRTEN, ,'DI RIGS GSAR BRTZOM LA RANG GZO'I NYEN CHEN 'OD, ,SPYIR BTANG BRTAGS DRIL SOGS BYED SKABS KYANG DON BZANG NGAN SKABS 'BYED PA'I TSIG CI SHES BRIS NAS DKON MCHOG LA GSOL BTAB KYI DMOD BCAS BYAS TE BSGRIL BAS CHOG PA DANG, ,BDAG GZHAN YANG DPE MO 'DEBS PA LTA BUS MTSON RANG GI BRTAG BYA'I DON BZANG NGAN SOGS KYI BRDAL CHANG DAM THA SNYAD BLOS BRDAG BYAS PA'I STENG @028A *, ,BDEN PA BRDAR BA'I GANG BABS BYAS CHOG 'DUG PA BZHIN DANG, ,DER MA BZANG SKABS SU BABS MIN DPAL LDAN LHA MOR GSOL BTAB KYIS RMIS LTAS BRTAGS PAR YANG LEGS PA'I MTSAN MA BYUNG BA BCAS, ,^THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA DANG, ,GZHAN YANG SHO MO RGYAS BSDUS SNA TSOGS SHIG 'DUG PAS KHA GSAL BA RNAMS KYI GZHI BYAS GONG MA'I ZHAL RGYUN GYIS BRGYAN ZHING, ,MO THING GCIG GIS MO BAB GANG YIN PA LTAS MCHOG KHA GSAL BAR BKOD PA 'DI NI, ,^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG LCAGS SAR CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG DPAL LDAN THUB BSTAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING GI BLA BRANG DU SBYAR BAS 'GRO KUN BLANG DOR GYI NYI MA GSAL BAS BDE SKYID PADMO RNAM PAR BZHAD PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
